name: lua-mtavscode
description: A VSCode extension that enables IntelliSense and various other elements to your current Lua LSP.

lua-mtavscode.serverSideFileKeywords.description: This configuration allows the extension to know which keyword in a file corresponds to a serversided Lua script.

lua-mtavscode.clientSideFileKeywords.description: This configuration allows the extension to know which keyword in a file corresponds to a clientsided Lua script.

lua-mtavscode.showMethodOOPSignature.description: This setting allows the extension to show the OOP signatures for a method. By default, the extension will show the signatures.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
